last_episode_to_air.name: The Helpers
last_episode_to_air.overview: Despite spending much of her time in hospitals due to a life-threatening heart condition, 12-year-old Abigail helped to start a service-minded club called The Helpers. Will and Jenna help the club to set up a carnival to raise money for Make-A-Wish.

name: Random Acts
overview: Whimsical and heartwarming, BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Dream Driveway
episodes.overview: Brooke, the mother of three young children, often wakes up in so much pain that she can't get out of bed. When this happens, her husband, Jeremy, has to take a day off work to care for the family. Watch Random Acts step in and help ease one of the family's biggest burdens in the series premiere.

episodes.name: Missed Christmas
episodes.overview: Nate and Stephanie's daughter, Everleigh, was born with severe physical disabilities. Due to a medical emergency, the family spent the holiday season in the ICU and thought they had missed Christmas... until Random Acts convinces Santa Claus to make an off-season visit!

episodes.name: Magic Movers
episodes.overview: New mom Janis has finally found her dream home, but her husband is currently serving in Afghanistan. Between working full-time, caring for her daughter, and volunteering to support other military spouses, Janis has a lot on her plate. To take some weight off her shoulders, Random Acts planned a bit of home-moving magic.

episodes.name: Studio C-prise
episodes.overview: Justin, Toni, and their daughter, Shayli, were devastated when Toni was diagnosed with cancer. With help from the Studio C cast, Random Acts devises an incredible birthday surprise for Shayli that she and her family will never forget. Then, watch BYU Vocal Point singers pose as maintenance workers to surprise patrons at an assisted-living facility.

episodes.name: Music and the Random Act
episodes.overview: Shelby was heartbroken when the sudden onset of a debilitating condition forced her to give up her music scholarship at UVU as well as her dream of playing with the Orchestra at Temple Square. But Random Acts likes to make dreams come true, so the team decided to surprise Shelby with the opportunity of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Ninja Makeover
episodes.overview: A struggling single mom wants to keep her promise of a dream bedroom makeover for her young son, Theo. The Random Acts team decides to make it happen... all in one night, while Theo is asleep in the room!

episodes.name: Here We Vow Again
episodes.overview: Since John was diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimers at age 57, he has been determined to make memories while he still can. Random Acts stages a backyard reception where he can surprise his wife, Jane, with a vow renewal ceremony.

episodes.name: Quilting Life Back Together
episodes.overview: After losing everything in a house fire, including all of Mom's quilting materials used as a source of income, the Suyak family needs a boost from the Random Acts team to "quilt" their life back together.

episodes.name: Illusion Reunion
episodes.overview: Janis hasn't seen her son and grandchildren for two years. The Random Acts team makes sure that Janis stumbles into a magic show for an illusion that will reunite mother and son.

episodes.name: Wheelin Forward
episodes.overview: Rebecca and Mo's lives were changed when a medical emergency put Mo in a wheelchair. Without proper transportation, Rebecca must singlehandedly lift Mo in and out of vehicles. Watch Random Acts bring surprises and relief to this special family.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Unforeseena Ballerina
episodes.overview: Like many young girls, Emmalene Meyers wants to be a ballerina, but her cerebral palsy makes everyday tasks a challenge. With the help of Ballet West, Random Acts brings Emmalene's dreams to the stage.

episodes.name: Copter Kindness
episodes.overview: Steffan Ellsworth suffers from a debilitating disease, and his family wants to fulfill his dream of flying before he loses his eyesight. Random Acts steps in to give Steffan the aerial experience of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Backyard Blitz
episodes.overview: Cole Keller is a young boy with special needs. Sarah is a mother determined to do everything she can to ensure her son's well-being. Watch Random Acts secretly transform the Kellers' backyard into a sanctuary the whole family can enjoy.

episodes.name: Goalden Ticket
episodes.overview: Gary Staples has dedicated his life to serving others, from opening a senior care center to coaching children's soccer, but now he is battling cancer. With the help of major league soccer team Real Salt Lake, the Random Acts team gives Gary the ultimate surprise.

episodes.name: Sleep Her Agent
episodes.overview: Despite living with chronic pain, Janet McClellan cares full-time for her sons with special needs. Watch Random Acts team up with RC Willey to replace Janet's decades-old bed with the relaxing bedroom she deserves.

episodes.name: Ball Dressed Up
episodes.overview: Ciera Thayne is a gifted young woman whose sudden illness knocked her off her feet. See how Random Acts pulled off a Regency Ball to honor Ciera, complete with period costumes and a surprise reunion of family and friends.

episodes.name: Love of My Light
episodes.overview: Chloe Batstone was fighting for her life until her husband Josh donated his kidney to her. Random Acts enlisted author Al Fox, singer Tiffany Alvord, and thousands of twinkle lights to transform a hospital room into a magical concert to lift the couple's spirits.

episodes.name: Ivory-One Loves You
episodes.overview: Passionate music teacher Weston Scow sold his piano when his wife Kristen experienced health challenges. See how Random Acts managed to sneak a brand new piano and a live orchestra into the house to surprise Weston on his birthday.

episodes.name: House Swarming Party
episodes.overview: Greg and Jennifer Gossard have nurtured several children who are in the foster care system, and they didn't hesitate when eight more children came their way. Random Acts enlisted Heart2Home to turn the Gossards' unfinished basement into a cozy living space in just one weekend.

episodes.name: Four the Love
episodes.overview: Random Acts throws the ultimate baby shower for a couple expecting quadruplets.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: ConGRADulations
episodes.overview: Savannah was diagnosed with a rare bone disease when she was 13, causing her to miss important events in her life including her high school graduation. Random Acts takes it upon themselves to create a high school graduation for her that we hope she'll never forget.

episodes.name: Over-Hauliday
episodes.overview: Ryan was in a skiing accident and is now paralyzed from the waist down. He has always had a love for nature and is now limited in his ability to share his passion for the outdoors with his family. Random Acts surprises Ryan with a gift that'll get him and his family in the great outdoors!

episodes.name: That's a Rap
episodes.overview: See how Random Acts surprises this beloved, dedicated, and deserving 3rd-grade teacher!

episodes.name: Grand Cameo
episodes.overview: In the summer of 2017, Kiarra Dalley had a terrible accident during a High School shop class that unfortunately resulted in the loss of her hand. Random Acts teams up with The Piano Guys for an unforgettable experience for this young aspiring pianist and dancer.

episodes.name: Let's Make A Smile
episodes.overview: Brinley is considered a medical miracle after surviving serious health complications at birth. Join the Random Acts team as they put a smile on her face by creating the ultimate, custom-made version of the game show "Let's Make a Deal."

episodes.name: Wyatt's World
episodes.overview: Wyatt, who suffers from a disability caused by a brain malformation at birth, is well known and loved within his community. Join Random Acts as they partner for the second time with "Heart 2 Home" to uniquely transform Wyatt's bedroom into a world just for him.

episodes.name: Make Yourself A Home
episodes.overview: This single mom has no idea what's in store for her when she helps a friend move into an apartment.

episodes.name: Saved By Service
episodes.overview: While serving a church mission in Australia, Kendall suffered a horrible accident where she was struck by a passing car. A passerby managed to miraculously save her life, but she was never able to meet him-until Random Acts decided to give her the surprise of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Yard In The Cards
episodes.overview: Four of Kadee and Brad's seven adopted children have Epidermolysis Bullosa, and Random Acts is taking it upon themselves to transform their backyard into a beautiful safe haven.

episodes.name: May The Horse Be With You
episodes.overview: Random Acts teams up with Hoofbeats to Healing to give this animal-loving girl the surprise of a lifetime!

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Love Is in the Air
episodes.overview: Will, Emilie, and Jenna team up with a local balloonist to make a bucket-list dream of riding in a hot air balloon come true for Julie, a woman who recently lost her husband to cancer. Plus, Will solicits the help of strangers to propose to Emilie!

episodes.name: Racing to Restore
episodes.overview: Will, Emilie, and Mason work together to restore an old Camaro and prepare a racetrack experience for Clint, a man who recently lost his father and brother to accident and illness.

episodes.name: Serving Service
episodes.overview: Will, Emilie, Mason, and Melanie spend the day as street performers to raise money for a mega-tip to give Laura, a waitress in Seattle who is constantly doing random acts of kindness for those around her.

episodes.name: The Commander
episodes.overview: Will and Emilie team up with a recording studio to surprise Carl, a service-oriented man with Down syndrome, with an opportunity to meet one of his favorite musicians: Alex Boyé.

episodes.name: Make or Bake
episodes.overview: Brooklyn is 14 years old and can only eat 20 foods, yet despite her severe allergies, she still loves to cook. She's always wanted to be on a baking competition TV show, and though her dream is seemingly impossible because of the limited ingredients she can touch or use, Emilie, Jenna, Will, and returning host Lisa Valentine Clark make it happen!

episodes.name: Random Tracks of Kindness
episodes.overview: David suffers from multiple blood disorders and as a result has lost both of his legs and several fingers. He can only leave his house via his electric wheelchair and public transportation. Will and Emilie decide to plan a special road trip for him and his wife, Carol, including a drive through a canyon, a lunch date in a snowy inn, and, of course,a few more surprises along the way.

episodes.name: Best Friends Fur-ever
episodes.overview: Ali has been battling cancer for years and has been in and out of remission since she was four. Through it all, her best friend, Bentlie, has stayed by her side. So Will and Emilie go to their elementary school to surprise them with a fun-filled adventure--including a plane ride, animal encounters, a zip line, and, of course, one final surprise!

episodes.name: The Great Indoors
episodes.overview: Jeff and Debbie Strong have adopted 15 children, many with disabilities or terminal conditions. Will and Melanie arrange a surprise trip to San Diego for Debbie, getting her out of the house for three days. While she's gone, teams of good Samaritan sub-contractors descend on the house to finish her basement and create an indoor play land for the children.

episodes.name: Snow Far Snow Good
episodes.overview: Katie has Treacher Collins Syndrome and was born without ears or cheekbones. Despite her own struggles, Katie and has dedicated herself to helping others embrace their own differences. Jenna and Emilie surprise Katie with trip into the mountains to go snowmobiling and dog sledding... and give her one more touching surprise she's not expecting!

episodes.name: From Random With Love
episodes.overview: Despite having Spina Bifida, Willliam is a happy and inspiring 12-year-old. Sadly, he lost his sister, who called him her super hero, in a tragic accident. The hosts surprise William at his school bus stop and take him to a "secret facility" where he works with stunt men and a film crew to create a super hero movie trailer!

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: BYUtv's original hidden-camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Soaring Surprise
episodes.overview: Chris Miller is a high school social worker and wrestling coach whose sole mission is to help students in need. His devotion to his students and wrestlers has literally saved lives. And on top of it all, he never takes a day off for himself. So Emilie and Jenna surprise Chris with an acrobatic stunt plane experience of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Jars of Joy
episodes.overview: Emily Jorgensen is a passionate and dedicated elementary school teacher. When tragedy befell her classroom she was there to help her students grieve and heal. But now Emily is experiencing her own health crisis, resulting in the amputation of her fingertips and toes. In the spirit of Jason F. Wright's book “Christmas Jars,” her entire school comes together to give Emily a mega Christmas surprise.

episodes.name: The Thrift Gift
episodes.overview: Mary Daniels owns a thrift store in Salt Lake City where her only goal is to provide for and serve the local homeless population. Random Acts surprises Mary with a scuba diving adventure and a back-home surprise she won't forget.

episodes.name: Cooking Up Kindness
episodes.overview: Cindy Adams has opened her home to numerous children in need of a loving family and used her talents to spread love via thousands upon thousands of desserts to those in need of a pick-me-up. Will and Jenna help make her 25-year-old dream of a new kitchen come true, and to top it off they do it all in one day.

episodes.name: Sky Thriving
episodes.overview: Savannah is a happy, positive, and charitable teenager who was recently diagnosed with Friedreich's Ataxia, a rare life-shortening disease. Navigating her new life has been full of challenges and trials, but despite this she's still trying to pursue  her dreams when she's physically able to. Emilie and Will step in to help her check skydiving off her bucket list.

episodes.name: We've Got Your Back(yard)
episodes.overview: Mindi Holmgren and her four children lost their husband and father in a tragic swimming accident. With so much to figure out, Mindi has had to put their dream of updating the backyard on an indefinite hold. Will and Melanie arrange for the Holmgren family to be out of town and then call in some old friends of the show to make Mindi's dream backyard become a reality.

episodes.name: National Treasures
episodes.overview: Edie Swan is an amazing wife, mother, and grandmother who has a rare condition called Chiari malformation, which makes it very hard for her to stand or ride in a car. She was once a ranger at her favorite place in the world, Arches National Park. But Edie doesn't think she'll ever be able to go back because it's so hard for her to travel. Emilie, Will, and Mason work together to make a special trip possible.

episodes.name: Passion for Fashion
episodes.overview: Lilly is dealing with the recent death of her father, but despite this tragedy she still dreams of becoming a fashion designer. Emilie, Mason, and returning host Lisa Valentine Clark work with Lilly's mother and school teacher to turn some of Lilly's designs into real-life creations.

episodes.name: Sail-ebration
episodes.overview: Dani Bates and her two daughters lost their husband and father to suicide. Heartbroken and confused they are trying to figure out how to move forward. To help her daughters remember their father Dani has wanted to make them a quilt out of his old t-shirts. Will distracts Dani with a surprise sailing trip, while Jenna works on a quilting miracle.

episodes.name: A Lotta Piñata
episodes.overview: Aleisha McDaniel constantly does random acts of kindness in her daily life, all while being a wife, mother, and school teacher and operating multiple non-profits to help those in need. One act of kindness Aleisha has done almost 300 times is leaving  a piñata full of candy on the doorstep of someone who needs a pick-me-up. Will and Jenna decide to help Aleisha with a giant  piñata surprise.

episodes.name: Space for Love
episodes.overview: Lisa Love is an elementary school teacher who has changed the lives of her students through her love of space. She even arranged for her school to video conference with the astronauts on the international space station, a privilege few schools get to experience. Will and Jenna fulfill Lisa's childhood, and adulthood, dream of going to Space Camp.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Random Kayacts
episodes.overview: Pauline Serna is an amazing mother who has made a great life for herself and her three children. She’s always wanted to take her two daughters and one son, Luis, camping. However, with Luis in a wheelchair, camping presents many challenges. Will and Emilie decide to surprise the Serna family with a camping and kayaking adventure on the Colorado River. But as always, there’s one more surprise just around the river bend. Will and Emilie have fun with tents at Scheels.

episodes.name: Free Run Fun
episodes.overview: Trey Montgomery is figuring out his new normal after the tragic loss of his father. Trey loves the training discipline of parkour, so Will and Jenna give Trey the parkour surprise of a lifetime. Will, Jenna, and Mason throw a dozen birthday parties.

episodes.name: Underwater Sea-Prise
episodes.overview: After losing her husband, Brad, to cancer, Robin Smith is staying strong for her children. Brad was a scuba diving enthusiast who worked in the industry and helped hundreds of people get certified. So Will and Emilie are just maybe going to run into Robin on Newport Beach, where they just might have ferry tickets and packed bags for a trip to Catalina Island where several more surprises are waiting above, and below, the ocean’s surface. Will and Jenna search for buried treasure at the aquarium.

episodes.name: Woodn’t Believe Your Eyes
episodes.overview: Jesse Wright has endured a life of struggle and pain, starting with a debilitating accident when he was 17 years old all the way to the recent loss of a loved one. Will and Emilie, along with the help of some familiar friends, help create and finish bedrooms for Jesse and his two kids, who’ve never had their own rooms. Will, Jenna, and Mason knock on random doors to help with those annoying little odd jobs.

episodes.name: Snow Day Like Today
episodes.overview: Zoie has sickle cell anemia, which prevents her from being able to play in extreme temperatures. If she gets too hot or too cold, she’ll end up in the hospital. Because of this, Zoie has never had the chance to play in snow. So Will and Emilie build an early Christmas winter wonderland in Zoie’s backyard when the outside temperature is just right, and the snowball fights and snow angels are finally allowed. Will and Emilie convince grocery shoppers to help them ring a bell for donations.

episodes.name: Wicked Surprise
episodes.overview: Molly is a vivacious young woman who loves to sing and dance. The discovery and subsequent treatment of a brain tumor has delayed her plans of finishing college and perusing her dream of performing on Broadway. Will and Jenna fly to the University of North Carolina Greensboro to deliver several surprises to Molly, all culminating with the final surprise of singing with Broadway star Shoshana Bean. Will, Jenna, and Mason reward kind college students.

episodes.name: Acrobatic Affection
episodes.overview: Annalise is the victim of severe bullying which led to physical and emotional abuse. To help Annalise know that she is loved, Emilie and Jenna make a dream come true by arranging a special performance where Annalise will be the star of the show. Mason and Emilie transform from caterpillar to butterfly in response to kindness.

episodes.name: Blue Sky Memory
episodes.overview: Maddi and Sammi are two sisters who were in a terrible car accident that took the life of their best friend. While the girls are still healing from their physical and emotional injuries, Will and Emilie surprise them with a magnificent adventure involving balloons, air travel, and a biosphere. Will, Emilie, and Mason have fun with balloons and kind strangers in a mall.

episodes.name: Hush-Hush Hawaii
episodes.overview: Kimberly is a selfless mother, wife, and friend. She has experienced great trials in her life including homelessness and addiction. Overcoming her trials, she now provides meals for those who are hungry, despite living on a small budget. Kimberly always puts others first, which is why Will and Jenna decide to give her a day off that includes pampering and a party she’ll never forget. Will and Emilie take to the road to show gratitude to frontline professionals.

episodes.name: Around the World in Addie Days
episodes.overview: Addison is an amazing young woman who suffers from a rare disease that will eventually take her vision. She has dreams to see many of the wonders the world has to offer,  but unfortunately she doesn’t have the time or the means to see hardly any of it. Will and Emilie secretly research some of the places Addison would like to see and plan  a virtual world tour with surprises along the way. Will and Mason have photographic fun with kind strangers.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Dolphinitely Seaprising
episodes.overview: Annalisa was born with a string of health challenges, and yet she is a positive and happy young woman who is constantly serving others. Will and Emilie setup a day of surprises including a trip to Florida and working as a dolphin trainer for a day. Everyone gets in the water with a very friendly pod of dolphins, and then gathers for one final gift; Emilie entices people to play a game that results in Will getting dropped into a tank of water.

episodes.name: Welcome Holmes
episodes.overview: Aimee Holmes is a kind, selfless, and empathetic wife, mother, and friend. During Aimee’s weekly neighborhood soccer game Will and Emilie surprise her with a baking class taught by a surprise guest baker. Aimee has no idea that she’s actually preparing a dinner for her family, and a mystery guest, someone she’s wanted to meet for a very long time. When dinner concludes, Aimee is given one final surprise that involves a bit of a journey; Will and Mason surprise kids at their lemonade stands.

episodes.name: That's So School
episodes.overview: Anna Jeffrey is visually impaired as a result of being left completely vulnerable at a young age. She is a wife, mother, preschool teacher, and the President of the Utah Council of the Blind. Anna serves everyone around her so Will and Jenna return the favor while Anna is out of town. With the help of some familiar friends the hosts rush in to create a smarter home, install some helpful updates and leave a big red surprise in the backyard; Emilie seeks help to load a lot into her little car.

episodes.name: A Knight To Remember
episodes.overview: Damien has Muscular Dystrophy and has lost his ability to walk. Will and Emilie work with several generous donors to help Damien and his family receive some much-needed tools that will keep Damien mobile. But the fun really begins when the hosts plan an ice-cold experience for Damien that requires him to fly on an airplane for the very first time so he can try out a new sport in Las Vegas; Will and Mason find people to help carry blocks of ice so they can then shave it, and share it.

episodes.name: Searching For Surprises
episodes.overview: The Watts family experienced the ultimately tragedy when their wife and mother was killed in a car accident. Denise Watts left behind her husband Mike and four young kids. She loved to celebrate everyone’s birthday and even taught herself how to make amazing cakes. Will and Emilie surprise the Watts with a scavenger hunt on Denise’s first birthday since the accident. Everything culminates into big birthday celebration; Emilie and Mason reward kind people who help Emilie solve clues.

episodes.name: The Cinderella Project
episodes.overview: When Angela Miller saw young women not going to prom because they didn’t have a dress, she decided to solve that problem with The Cinderella Project. Will and Emilie enlist Angela’s help to design and put on a ball for a very deserving person. After a couple twists and twirls the hosts end up with a ballroom with hundreds of grateful teenagers; Emilie and Mason convince random mall shoppers to help Emilie pick a dress.

episodes.name: Zoo-mongous Surprise
episodes.overview: Esther is a kind young woman who loves to dance, but due to a rare disease that is causing her brain to shrink she’s losing the ability to control one of her legs. Because Esther also loves Elephants, Will and Mason head to the zoo to set up an elephant encounter and a dancing surprise with her favorite TikTok Celebrity; Will and Jenna ask for help in choosing animal costumes.

episodes.name: Ready, Set, Snow!
episodes.overview: Noelle Rasmussen and her family were evacuated from their home in downtown Nashville at 4am Christmas morning. As they drove away a bomb exploded on their street. Will and Jenna give this wonderful family a Christmas redo. In late Spring the Hosts decorate the family’s new home in Christmas lights and lawn décor, setting in motion an adventure that ends in chasing snow, finding a blizzard, and a special visitor; Will and Mason decorate front yards to celebrate Secret Santas of the world.

episodes.name: Hawaiian Hijinks
episodes.overview: Christie Rasmussen does random acts of kindness every single day. She gives all she has to serve everyone in her life, including each new person who she might meet every day. Because of her constant service she’s never been a vacation with just her husband Brian. Will, Jenna, and Mason surprise Christie and Brian with a dream vacation to a place with palm trees; Will and Jenna ask for help in setting up a picnic.

episodes.name: Love and Lederhosen
episodes.overview: Ricky and Lexi were both diagnosed with cancer as teenagers. They eventually met and fell in love at the hospital while receiving treatment. Ricky was born in Germany and although Lexi has been able to travel there, she was too sick to enjoy it. So, Emilie and Mason surprise Ricky and Lexi with a Bavarian dinner full of family and friends, with dessert becoming another surprise entirely; Will, Jenna, and Mason pay it forward with coconuts.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Diving and Thriving
episodes.overview: When Nate Ogden became a quadriplegic, he refused to give up on his huge underwater dream. Will, Emilie, and Mason work with a specialized organization to make Nate's dream a reality. Emilie and Mason set up a spa surprise right outside an elevator.

episodes.name: One Stop Holiday Shop
episodes.overview: Cheryl Smith, founding member of the Autism Council of Utah, gets a Christmas surprise. Having missed almost all family activities because of the care her autistic son Carson requires, she gets to catch up on much-needed grandkid time.

episodes.name: Duvet is the Day
episodes.overview: Lucy Blaylock has been making blankets for children all over the world to help them through hard times. Overwhelmed with orders, Will and Emilie put together a team to help Lucy fulfill her orders and give her the surprise trip she’d always wanted.

episodes.name: Bag Pipe-Dream
episodes.overview: Kari Craig is known for her dependable good mood and willingness to help anyone in need, especially in her work as a medical professional. The hosts surprise Kari with a trip to a local Scottish festival and more to celebrate her heritage.

episodes.name: A Room of His Own
episodes.overview: The Kendall family works hard through many sleepless nights to care for their son with special needs and still manages to be active and beloved members of their community. The hosts facilitate a major surprise for them to make their lives easier.

episodes.name: Snappy Memories
episodes.overview: The Spindle family is known for being selfless and giving, even after they lost everything--including their family photos--in a wildfire. The Random Acts team sets up a photo shoot to help the Spindles recapture their favorite memories.

episodes.name: Peak-ing Amazing
episodes.overview: After losing her dad in a tragic rock climbing accident, Winter has turned her grief into helping and lifting others and continuing climbing. The hosts surprise Winter with a trip that will honor her father and continue his legacy.

episodes.name: Lemon-Aid Stand
episodes.overview: Ever since she lost a teacher to cancer, Savannah has been organizing an annual lemonade stand that has grown to involve her whole community and has raised thousands of dollars. The hosts surprise her with a country music trip of her dreams.

episodes.name: Italian Sopresa
episodes.overview: Katie is constantly serving others despite the challenges she faces with Spina Bifida and after losing her adopted mom. Her friends come together with the Random Acts team to give her the birthday celebration she deserves.

episodes.name: Turtally Amazing
episodes.overview: Despite being born with brittle bone disease, Hadley is a constant source of joy for all those around her. Since she loves swimming and sea turtles, the Random Acts team surprises Hadley with an up close and personal turtle experience.

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.

episodes.name: Lighting Their World
episodes.overview: Jessica Rigsby is seven years into a five-year cancer diagnosis and is trying to have lots of happy family memories while she still can. The hosts plan a Christmas surprise that involves a very bright surprise; Emilie and Mason vend kindness.

episodes.name: Arizona to Denmark
episodes.overview: Will arrives at Camp Grace in Arizona to surprise camp director Jennifer Brimhall with a life-changing trip to Denmark, where Jennifer's ancestors lived before emigrating to America.

episodes.name: Kindness Begins With Kim
episodes.overview: Kim Fields is a campus supervisor at Taft Union High School where he’s impacted thousands of students. The hosts plan a huge pep rally in his honor, with a final NFL-related surprise.

episodes.name: Life's a Circus
episodes.overview: Carilee Card is an exceptional woman who suffers from serious health issues due to the long-term effects of having anorexia. She loves doing acrobatics, so Will and JiWon head to Vegas to plan a circus surprise.

episodes.name: Giving Back to Brenda
episodes.overview: Brenda Hughes feeds her community through her organization, the Giving Back Foundation. The Random Acts team surprises Brenda with a trip to Paris, the place she feels an emotional connection to.

episodes.name: In For A Penny
episodes.overview: Penny and Lee Larson have fostered over 65 children despite Penny's ongoing medical struggles. Will, Jenna, and Charan join Heart 2 Home to surprise the family with a much-needed home renovation that allows Penny to better care for the kids.

episodes.name: Emily in NYC
episodes.overview: Emily Traveller became paralyzed from the shoulders down in 2022, stalling her dreams of being a fashion designer. The hosts team up with Runway of Dreams to give Emily a NYC Fashion Week experience to remind her that her goals are still possible.

episodes.name: Double the Fun
episodes.overview: Joy and Diana nominated each other for a Random Act, so Jenna and Charan decide that two surprises are better than one. The women decorate each other's houses. Joy and Diana also love The Chosen TV show, so the hosts get them a special VIP tour.

episodes.name: Missy on the Move
episodes.overview: Missy, a 17-year-old with spina bifida loves the theater and performing. The hosts plan a surprise that allows Missy to be a reporter for a day. She also receives a much-needed gift from Compassion Mobility.

episodes.name: The Helpers
episodes.overview: Despite spending much of her time in hospitals due to a life-threatening heart condition, 12-year-old Abigail helped to start a service-minded club called The Helpers. Will and Jenna help the club to set up a carnival to raise money for Make-A-Wish.

9.name: Season 9
9.overview: BYUtv's original hidden camera show highlights the good in humanity through surprise service projects and pranks with a purpose.
